title: Should I persuade my boyfriend from joining the military (marine corps)? If yes, how? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why would you ever think about persuading someone to not follow their desires in life, especially joing the military. You should be proud of him. You should support him. It takes a special person to make a commitment like that. You should thank your lucky stars you have a guy like that!

Why would you want to do that? The Marines (or military in general) is a great way for a young man to start his working career. He’ll learn many things, will see places he’s never been and will get many financial and educational benefits if he decides to use them, as well.

No. He would be taking a position in which he would serve his country. Maybe you can try to persuade him to stay for a short time so that he can come back to you. Besides, when he does come back, you get discounts and nice parking:)
